org.relationlearn.util.io

Interface InputParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLFileParser

    public interface InputParser
    The InputParser interface defines the behaviour of any class that wants to be used as a way of extracting data from a given input format the user needs to.
    See Also:
    RelationDigraph

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,RelationDigraph> parseInput(String uri)
      Parses data at a given URI and generates a Map containing as many RelationDigraph instances as the implementation is able to find in the URI provided.

    • Method Detail

      • parseInput

        Map<String,RelationDigraph> parseInput(String uri)
        Parses data at a given URI and generates a Map containing as many RelationDigraph instances as the implementation is able to find in the URI provided.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI where the data to be parsed should be found
        Returns:
        a Map containing all RelationDigraph instances parsed

        Note: Although this method is not expected to throw any unchecked exceptions, the IllegalArgument exception should be thrown in case of a fatal error regarding the input URI.
